prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon that resembles a kangaroo with a unique twist.
Show me a strong Normal-type Pokemon with a nurturing personality and a large pouch.
Imagine a Pokemon with brown fur and a cream belly, perfect for a forest habitat.
Design a Pokemon that can evolve into a more powerful version while retaining its motherly traits.
Make a playful and protective Pokemon that thrives in grassland and mountain regions.
Generate a detailed description of a Pokemon that carries its young in a pouch.
Give me an image of a Pokemon with a powerful physique and a gentle demeanor.
